Citedpaper.ArticleName: Miguel Valero-García , Juan J. Navarro , José M. Llabería , Mateo Valero , Tomás Lang, A method for implementation of one-dimensional systolic algorithms with data contraflow using pipelined functional units, Journal of VLSI Signal Processing Systems, v.4 n.1, p.7-25, Feb. 1992

Title: Systematic hardware adaptation of systolic algorithms
Abstract: In this paper we propose a methodology to adapt Systolic Algorithms to the hardware selected for their implementation. Systolic Algorithms obtained can be efficiently implemented using Pipelined Functional Units. The methodology is based on two transformation rules. These rules are applied to an initial Systolic Algorithm, possibly obtained through one of the design methodologies proposed by other authors. Parameters for these transformations are obtained from the specification of the hardware to be used. The methodology has been particularized in the case of one-dimensional Systolic Algorithms with data contraflow.
